## Context class

The rendering context, tied to a canvas element.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default class Context 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)()](./webgl.context._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>Context</code> class |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [getGlContext()](./webgl.context.getglcontext.md) |  | Returns the WebGL2RenderingContext of the canvas element it's tied to once available. |
|  [initialize(canvas)](./webgl.context.initialize.md) |  | Ties the context to a given canvas element. This can only be called once and needs to be called, before any rendering can take place. |
